proposal: Diving into KoiPond, it's clear you're not just another launchpad but a secure and fair haven for BRC20 launches. With KOI at the heart, ensuring community-first token distribution, it's impressive. Congrats on gathering 54 holders on the ETH network! If you're looking to expand KOI's utilities, our B2B tools like DEX creation and Lottery might align well with your vision, offering more ways for your community to engage and benefit. Let's make the ecosystem even more rewarding for everyone involved.
